body_html:
Actually I simply changed the with variable_scope.variable_scope(None, "bahdanau_attention", [query]): to with variable_scope.variable_scope("bahdanau_attention"): and it works fine for static_rnn. And after all, I changed to the combination of attention + dynamic_rnn and it works fine.
Thanks for all your help
body_text:
Actually I simply changed the with variable_scope.variable_scope(None, "bahdanau_attention", [query]): to with variable_scope.variable_scope("bahdanau_attention"): and it works fine for static_rnn. And after all, I changed to the combination of attention + dynamic_rnn and it works fine.
Thanks for all your help
body:
Actually I simply changed the `with variable_scope.variable_scope(None, "bahdanau_attention", [query]):` to `with variable_scope.variable_scope("bahdanau_attention"):` and it works fine for static_rnn. And after all, I changed to the combination of attention + dynamic_rnn and it works fine.
 Thanks for all your help
